document_data.caption: A map of the Pirate Isles showing the Windrace in the center.
document_data.name: Windrace
document_data.region: The [[Pirate Isles]], the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: '''The Windrace''' was a prominent strait found within the [[Pirate  Isles]] on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Geography: The Windrace stretched roughly from [[the Bowl]] in the south to [[Alphar Isle]] in the north.
document_data.Description: The Windrace derived its name from the strong prevailing winds in the area, allowing for relatively safe and quick travel for a vessel heading from the Bowl to Alphar Isle. Travel in the opposite direction was extremely slow because of the same winds.
document_data.History: A popular way to settle disputes between captains in the Pirate Isles was to race from [[Mirg Isle]] across the Bowl and through the Windrace to Alphar Isle.
